text: Geraldo Sarno (6 March 1938 – 22 February 2022) was a Brazilian documentarist, screenwriter and movie director. Sarno was born in Poções, Bahia, Brazil. His movie, Colonel Delmiro Gouveia (1978), was his best known movie and famous during the Cinema Novo movement. Sarno died from problems caused by COVID-19 on 22 February 2022 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Brazilian screenwriters Category:Brazilian movie directors Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Rio de Janeiro Category:People from Bahia
